# peopleInPhoto

**Instance Property**

The people identified in the photos.

## Declaration

```swift
var peopleInPhoto: [INPerson]? { get }
```

## Discussion

When this property contains one or more [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPerson] objects, your search should return only photos that contain the specified people. Use the operator in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForPhotosIntent/peopleInPhotoOperator] property to determine whether to search for photos containing all, some, or none of the specified people.

## Getting the People in the Photos

- **peopleInPhotoOperator**: The operator that defines how to search for people in the photos.
